name: Simost
description:
Simost or 

Simple Mobile Strategy is a step-by-step 2D strategy for mobile devices.

Gameplay:

There are 3 types of troops in the game:
Infantry, artillery, tanks.
Infantry - goes far.
The tank has a lot of health.
Artillery does a lot of damage.
The field is divided into cells. Each unit receives a different bonus from different types of cells. The task of each team is to destroy each other.

Game modes
1.Campaign

A set of pre-arranged missions that are linked by a simple story.
There are a total of 14 missions, 7 for each side, red or blue.

2.Battle 

Randomly generated map, with the same number of troops on both sides. You can play both against the AI and against another player on one device.

This is my first game on Unity.
